trans-unit.source: Specifies Desktop Window Manager (DWM) thumbnail properties

seg-source.mrk: Specifies Desktop Window Manager (DWM) thumbnail properties

target.mrk: Specifies Desktop Window Manager (DWM) thumbnail properties

trans-unit.source: Handle of the thumbnail to retrieve the source window size from.

seg-source.mrk: Handle of the thumbnail to retrieve the source window size from.

target.mrk: Handle of the thumbnail to retrieve the source window size from.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Specifies whether make the thumbnail visible or invisible, valid values:

seg-source.mrk: Specifies whether make the thumbnail visible or invisible, valid values:

target.mrk: Specifies whether make the thumbnail visible or invisible, valid values:

trans-unit.source: [optional] Specifies whether use only the thumbnail source's client area or entire window, valid values:

seg-source.mrk: Specifies whether use only the thumbnail source's client area or entire window, valid values:

target.mrk: Specifies whether use only the thumbnail source's client area or entire window, valid values:

trans-unit.source: True - Use only source's client area.

seg-source.mrk: True - Use only source's client area.

target.mrk: True - Use only source's client area.

trans-unit.source: [optional] The opacity with which to render the thumbnail. 0 is fully transparent while 255 (Default) is fully opaque.

seg-source.mrk: The opacity with which to render the thumbnail.
0 is fully transparent while 255 (Default) is fully opaque.

target.mrk: The opacity with which to render the thumbnail.
0 is fully transparent while 255 (Default) is fully opaque.

trans-unit.source: [optional] $tagRECT structure containing the rectangle in the destination window the thumbnail will be rendered.

seg-source.mrk: $tagRECT structure containing the rectangle in the destination window the thumbnail will be rendered.

target.mrk: $tagRECT structure containing the rectangle in the destination window the thumbnail will be rendered.

trans-unit.source: By default, the size of this rectangle equal to the source size of the DWM thumbnail which returns the _WinAPI_DwmQueryThumbnailSourceSize() function.

seg-source.mrk: By default, the size of this rectangle equal to the source size of the DWM thumbnail which returns the _WinAPI_DwmQueryThumbnailSourceSize() function.

target.mrk: By default, the size of this rectangle equal to the source size of the DWM thumbnail which returns the _WinAPI_DwmQueryThumbnailSourceSize() function.

trans-unit.source: [optional] $tagRECT structure containing the rectangle that specifies the region of the source window to use as the thumbnail.

seg-source.mrk: $tagRECT structure containing the rectangle that specifies the region of the source window to use as the thumbnail.

target.mrk: $tagRECT structure containing the rectangle that specifies the region of the source window to use as the thumbnail.

trans-unit.source: By default, the entire window is used as the thumbnail.

seg-source.mrk: By default, the entire window is used as the thumbnail.

target.mrk: By default, the entire window is used as the thumbnail.

trans-unit.source: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended flag may contain the HRESULT error code.

seg-source.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended flag may contain the HRESULT error code.

target.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended flag may contain the HRESULT error code.

trans-unit.source: Thumbnail relationships created by _WinAPI_DwmRegisterThumbnail() will not be rendered to the destination window until this function is called.

seg-source.mrk: Thumbnail relationships created by _WinAPI_DwmRegisterThumbnail() will not be rendered to the destination window until this function is called.

target.mrk: Thumbnail relationships created by _WinAPI_DwmRegisterThumbnail() will not be rendered to the destination window until this function is called.

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls will update the thumbnail according to the properties.

seg-source.mrk: Subsequent calls will update the thumbnail according to the properties.

target.mrk: Subsequent calls will update the thumbnail according to the properties.

trans-unit.source: This function requires Windows Vista or later.

seg-source.mrk: This function requires Windows Vista or later.

target.mrk: This function requires Windows Vista or later.

trans-unit.source: Require Windows Vista or later with enabled Aero theme.

seg-source.mrk: Require Windows Vista or later with enabled Aero theme.

target.mrk: Require Windows Vista or later with enabled Aero theme.

trans-unit.source: Create the "sheet of glass" effect for the entire window. You must call this function whenever DWM composition is toggled.

seg-source.mrk: Create the "sheet of glass" effect for the entire window.
You must call this function whenever DWM composition is toggled.

target.mrk: Create the "sheet of glass" effect for the entire window.
You must call this function whenever DWM composition is toggled.
